TopicTitle: Black screen on last version On Mac Sierra + Steam

Articles.Content:
Hello !

first, i apologise for my english, i'm french...

So, like many here, when i lunch my ksp i have a black screen and that's all.  I tried many things like move the ksp.app out of the folder (it does lunch and i have the ksp mouse but still a black screen...), i tried to move the ksp_osx who is in the .app out and put it again in the app. I tried to re-install the game but it doesn't work either.

It's the last version of ksp in a updated steam on mac os x sierra 10.12.6 and it's the new macbook pro so it should be quite powerfull (even for a mac).

 

Do you guys have a resolution for my problem ?

thanks !

Edited October 5, 2017 by Atlas11

have a look at this topic, also welcome to the forums!
